name: CI/CD Pipeline
description: Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery pipeline for automating software build, test, and deployment processes
when_to_use:
Frequent code changes
Need for automated testing
Rapid deployment requirements
Team collaboration on code
benefits:
Faster release cycles
Reduced manual errors
Automated quality checks
Early bug detection
drawbacks:
Initial setup complexity
Requires infrastructure
Learning curve for teams
use_cases:
Web application deployment
Microservices architecture
Mobile app releases
Cloud-native applications

typescript.code:
// Example CI/CD pipeline configuration (GitHub Actions)
name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build-and-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v2
      with:
        node-version: '16'
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci
    - name: Run tests
      run: npm test
    - name: Build application
      run: npm run build
    - name: Deploy to staging
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
      run: echo 'Deploy to staging environment'
